title: Alexander-Arnold celebration ´told enough´ about Liverpool future, says Slot
description: Arne Slot said Trent Alexander-Arnold’s celebration after scoring in Liverpool’s win at West Ham “told enough” about his commitment to the club. Alexander-Arnold netted Liverpool’s fourth goal in their 5-0 thrashing of the Hammers on Sunday, moving them eight points clear at the Premier League summit. The Reds have now scored 5+ goals in consecutive […] The post Alexander-Arnold celebration ´told enough´ about Liverpool future, says Slot appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: AC Milan 1-1 Roma: Rossoneri and Giallorossi share spoils at San Siro
description: AC Milan and Roma shared the spoils following a 1-1 draw at San Siro. Paulo Dybala cancelled out Tijjani Reijnders’ earlier effort as the two sides settled for a point apiece. Alexis Saelemaekers struck the post early on for the hosts, who took the lead in the 16th minute, with Reijnders’ thumping first-time strike leaving […] The post AC Milan 1-1 Roma: Rossoneri and Giallorossi share spoils at San Siro appeared first on Soccer News.
